text: Thought about wifi / 3G - we don't have control over the time the job runs, and I believe we're restricting to only download if over Wifi - if they're not, does it hold the job and retry when on wifi, or will it just fail and hope tomorrow you're on wifi when it runs?
weâ€™re talking about the wallpaper zip download?
It hangs onto the job until the conditions are met
It's periodic, so it always runs once a day at a point that someone is on wifi
If they're never on wifi, it never runs
